section.title: Design Specification
section.description: Define the UX guidelines and page flow that will be directly reflected in MVP development.

subsection.title: Key Pages (Features)
subsection.description: List the key pages that must be implemented in the MVP. (Use the same feature IDs as Section 6.1 where applicable.)
subsection.example: - F3: Main Screen - F4: Post Creation Screen - F5: Post List/Detail Screen

subsection.title: Page Navigation
subsection.description: Summarize how users navigate between pages and key scenarios.
subsection.example: 1. The user accesses the main screen. 2. Sign-up/Login → Redirects to the main screen upon successful login. 3. View post list → Enter the post details screen → Create a post (Login required). (Optional) This flow can be visualized using a Mermaid Sequence Diagram.
